Name: Pomegranate Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge & pomegranate seeds.
Review: Freshly pressed pomegranate juice is essential to the success of this deliciously fruity but dry Daiquiri . Sadly, packaged juice doesn't produce a cocktail of comparable quality.
History: Created in May 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Pomegranate Daiquiri contains 153 calories
